name: Creamy Lemon Dressing
description: This would be perfect as a coleslaw dressing or drizzled on romaine hearts, tomatoes, or cucumbers.

ingredients.name: Turmeric & Ginger Blend Enhanced Herbal Tea

preparation: Place tea leaves in a medium bowl. Pour in water and steep for 5 minutes. Strain, pressing the tea leaves. Allow tea to cool completely.

Whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Sea Salt and Black Pepper. In a steady stream, slowly whisk in tea until dressing is desired consistency. Taste for seasoning, and store in an airtight container in the fridge up to 3 days.
tips: Serve with fish or chicken, coleslaw, salad greens, or in tuna sandwiches.
